DOC.brief_title: Resting Metabolic Rate in Chronic Bed-Ridden Patients
DOC.detailed_description: Are standard REE equations suitable for estimating resting metabolic rate in long term, bed ridden, chronically ill patients? Research objective: to measure resting metabolic rate (REE) in long term, bed ridden, chronically ill patients and to compare their measured energy needs to standard REE equations
DOC.criteria: Age (years): 1830, 3160, 6174, 75100 Confinement to bed at least for a year Mechanical ventilation Tracheostomy
